divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work , it was apromx 11:30pm. I stopped my car because in front of me in the sky appears a bright redrange ball of light It terrified me at first there was one , then behind it appeared two more of the same. The seemed to hover then go overhead and disappear. I was the only car on the road at the time , I was hoping there was someone else there to see what I was seeing. I went to call my husband when I started driving but my cell phone had died . I had no idea what it was it didn't seem to be an airplane I have never seen anything like it.
Summary: Fire like balls of light in dark sky , one then 2 more , hovered then disappear
trends: There have been no other sightings in Frederick
This sighting has never been favorited.
